replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
2056186337 发表于 2015-9-4 14:41
我还是看不太懂  虽说可以复制 但自己不会写 所以种类少  我要小白僵尸苦力怕的就好  谁能给我 版本1.7.2 ...
虽说你好像已经找到答案了，不过我实在是没什么事做就把你要的“小白僵尸苦力怕”弄给你

/summon 怪物 ~ ~1 ~复制代码
骷髅
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~复制代码
僵尸
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~复制代码
苦力怕（爬行者）
/summon Creeper ~ ~1 ~复制代码

这个只是召唤
我想玩个东西
比如说苦力怕（爬行者）骑着蝙蝠应该很好玩吧
/summon Creeper ~ ~1 ~ {Riding:{id:Bat}}复制代码

然后最后一个（我真的没事做 233）算是一个Boss吧←_←

/summon Wolf ~ ~1 ~ {Angry:1,CustomName:"狼王",CustomNameVisible:1,PersistenceRequired:1b,CanPickUpLoot:1b,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:1000},{Name:"generic.followRange",Base:500},{Name:"generic.knockbackResistance",Base:0.1f},{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:1f},{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base:10}],Fire:1277951,DropChances:[2F,2F,2F,2F,2F],Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:bone",tag:{display:{Name:"狼王的骨头",Lore:["备注：非常的坚固"]}},Count:1},{id:"minecraft:gold_block",tag:{display:{Name:"狼王的金块徽章",Lore:["狼王年幼时水茶馆兑换的"]}},Count:1},{id:"minecraft:bookshelf",tag:{display:{Name:"狼王的智慧",Lore:["智商：233"]}},Count:1},{id:"minecraft:bow",tag:{display:{Name:"狼王之弓",Lore:["山洞里面捡到的"]}},Count:1},{id:"minecraft:glowstone",tag:{display:{Name:"Lichi2050无聊",Lore:["我很无聊"]}},Count:1}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:1,Amplifier:0,Duration:2147483647},{Id:5,Amplifier:0,Duration:2147483647},{Id:8,Amplifier:0,Duration:2147483647},{Id:10,Amplifier:0,Duration:2147483647},{Id:21,Amplifier:0,Duration:2147483647},{Id:22,Amplifier:0,Duration:2147483647}]}复制代码
